from.name: Mr. Henry Turner
from.address: Three Ravinia Drive, Suite 1560, Atlanta, GA 30346

subject: Florida Business Letter Cover
comments: David, we were successful in getting the 4 major business organizations in Florida to jointly sign a letter to the legislature calling for the repeal of SB 2110. The letters were hand delivered to each of the legislative offices this morning. Sen. Charles Williams will have a press conference this morning announcing his sponsorship of the repeal bill. Thanks.
